sentences.english: The invention discloses a diflubenzuron water dispersible granule and the preparation method of the diflubenzuron water dispersible granule;
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种灭幼脲水分散粒剂及其制备方法。

sentences.english: Ureaplasma urealyticum is a major pathogen which caused urogenital infections.
sentences.chinese: 解脲脲脉原体是引起泌尿生殖道感染的重要病原体。

sentences.english: They say hydrogen peroxide or carbamide peroxide may also help.
sentences.chinese: 他们说过氧化氢和过氧化脲也可能对此会有帮助。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the improvement in the dissolution properties of glibenclamide by micronization and complexation with β-cyclodextrin.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察微粉化及包合技术对格列本脲溶出度的影响。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To exam the glibenclamide added in Shiwei Yuquan capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的检测十味玉泉胶囊中添加的格列苯脲。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the method for determination of glibenclamide.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立测定消糖灵胶囊中格列本脲含量的方法。

sentences.english: Methods Drug sensitive detection was made to 125 strains of urealyticum ureaplasma.
sentences.chinese: 方法对125株解脲支原体进行药敏检测。

sentences.english: RESULTS Glibenclamide was detected in Shiwei Yuquan capsule.
sentences.chinese: 结果供试品中检出了格列苯脲。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ured peroxide is much better than that of hydrogen peroxide when both used as the hydrogen accepter of substrate A.
sentences.chinese: 结论过氧化脲比过氧化氢更适宜作底物A中的受氢体。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish an HPLC method for determining glibenclamide in Xiaokeping granules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立测定消渴平颗粒中格列本脲含量的方法。

sentences.english: The pharmacological activity of glibenclamide could potentially affect ER function.
sentences.chinese: 格列本脲的药理学活性可能潜在影响ER的功能。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION S The dissolution properties of glibenclamide was improved remarkably by micronization and complexation with β-cyclodextrin.
sentences.chinese: 结论微粉化及包合技术能显著提高格列本脲的溶出度。

sentences.english: You will convert the carvone to its semicarbazone for use in a polarimetric analysis.
sentences.chinese: 为了作旋光度分析，你将会把香芹酮转变为缩胺基脲。

sentences.english: Urea can increase the speed of the washing out process.
sentences.chinese: 脲能增加刚果红从已经染色的肌纤维中洗脱的速率。

sentences.english: You will also characterize the semicarbazone by melting point determination.
sentences.chinese: 你也要通过测定熔点以鉴定缩胺基脲。
